member.name: ITfContextOwnerServices.CreateRange
member.summary: The ITfContextOwnerServices.CreateRange method creates a new ranged based upon a specified character position.
member.param: Specifies the starting character position of the range.
Specifies the ending character position of the range.
Receives a pointer to the range object within the specified starting and ending character positions.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The specified range is NULL or the specified starting character position is less than zero or the specified starting character position is greater than the specified ending character position.

member.name: ITfContextOwnerServices.ForceLoadProperty
member.param: Pointer to an object that specifies the property to load.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfContextOwnerServices.OnAttributeChange
member.summary: Called by a context owner to generate notifications that a support attribute value changed.
member.param: Specifies the GUID of the support attribute.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfContextOwnerServices.OnLayoutChange
member.summary: The ITfContextOwnerServices.OnLayoutChange method is called by the context owner when the on-screen representation of the text stream is updated during a composition. Text stream updates include when the position of the window that contains the text is changed or if the screen coordinates of the text change.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfContextOwnerServices.OnStatusChange
member.summary: The ITfContextOwnerServices.OnStatusChange method is called by the context owner when the dwDynamicFlags member of the structure returned by the method changes.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfContextOwnerServices.Serialize
member.summary: The ITfContextOwnerServices.Serialize method obtains a property from a range of text and writes the property data into a stream object. This enables an application to store property data, for example, when writing the data to a file.
member.param: Pointer to an interface that identifies the property to serialize.
Pointer to an interface that identifies the range that the property is obtained from.
Pointer to a structure that receives the header data for the property.
Pointer to an IStream object that the TSF manager will write the property data to.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfContextOwnerServices.Unserialize
member.summary: Applies previously serialized property data to a property object.
member.param: Pointer to an object that receives the property data.
Pointer to a structure that contains the header data for the property.
Pointer to an IStream object that contains the property data. This parameter can be NULL if pLoader is not NULL. This parameter is ignored if pLoader is not NULL.
Pointer to an object that the TSF manager uses to obtain the property data. This parameter can be NULL if pStream is not NULL.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The property data is obtained asynchronously.
A synchronous read-only lock cannot be obtained.

member.name: ITfContextOwnerServices
member.summary: The ITfContextOwnerServices interface is implemented by the manager and used by a text service or application acting as context owners. The interface provides notification changes to sinks and other services to context owners that do not implement the or interfaces. Clients obtain this interface by calling the method.
